titles.title: A bill to provide that any requirement to substantiate a deduction under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 for business use of a vehicle be based on the regulations in effect before the Tax Reform Act of 1984.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Provides that any requirement to substantiate a deduction under the Internal Revenue Code with respect to the business use of a vehicle must be based on regulations in effect before enactment of the Tax Reform Act of 1984.
